changeSet.author: Suraj
changeSet.comment: Adding New Concepts for PrEP Screening Tool Form

changeSet.author: Kc

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_name where name in ('PrEP ST Form, Service Provided', 'PrEP ST Form, Facility','PrEP ST Form, Site Type','PrEP ST Form, District', 'PrEP ST Form, Setting','PrEP ST Form, Client offered PrEP?', 'PrEP ST Form, Client accepted PrEP?') and concept_name_type= 'FULLY_SPECIFIED' and voided =0 ;

changeSet.author: Suraj

preConditions.sqlCheck: select COUNT(*) from concept_set cs join concept_name cn on cs.concept_id = cn.concept_id where cs.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name ='PrEP Screening Tool Template' AND concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") and cs.concept_set IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = 'All Observation Templates');

changeSet.comment: Adding set member PrEP Screening Tool to all observation templates

changeSet.author: Suraj
changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to "PrEP ST Form, Has the client had vaginal or anal intercourse without condoms with more than 1 partner in the last 6 months?"

changeSet.author: Suraj
changeSet.comment: Adding "PrEP ST Form, How many sexual partners did you have vaginal or anal sex with?" to numeric table
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO concept_numeric (concept_id,hi_absolute,hi_critical,hi_normal,low_absolute,low_critical,low_normal,units,precise,display_precision) VALUES ((select concept_id from concept_name where name = 'PrEP ST Form, How many sexual partners did you have vaginal or anal sex with?' and concept_name_type = 'FULLY_SPECIFIED' and locale = 'en' and voided = 0),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,1,NULL);

changeSet.author: Suraj
changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to "PrEP ST Form, In the past 6 months, did you use condoms consistently during sex?"

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ( 'BAMBANANI', 'MAC', 'GWERU', 'NKULUMANE', 'CHITUNGWIZA', 'NAH', 'CHIPINGE', 'MUTARE', 'CONCESSION', 'CHIREDZI', 'TRIANGLE', 'MASVINGO' ) and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "PrEP ST Form, Facility");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to PrEP ST Form Question

changeSet.author: psi

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ( 'BEITBRIDGE', 'BIKITA', 'BINDURA', 'BINGA', 'BUBI', 'BUHERA', 'BULAWAYO', 'BULILIMA', 'CENTENARY', 'CHEGUTU', 'CHIKOMBA', 'CHIMANIMANI', 'CHIPINGE', 'CHIREDZI', 'CHIRUMHANZU', 'CHIVI', 'GOKWE NORTH', 'GOKWE SOUTH', 'GOROMONZI', 'GURUVE', 'GUTU', 'GWANDA', 'GWERU', 'HARARE', 'HURUNGWE', 'HWANGE', 'HWEDZA', 'INSIZA', 'KADOMA', 'KARIBA', 'KWEKWE', 'LUPANE', 'MAKONDE', 'MAKONI', 'MANGWE', 'MARONDERA', 'MASVINGO', 'MATOBO', 'MAZOWE', 'MBERENGWA', 'MBIRE', 'MT.DARWIN', 'MUDZI', 'MUREWA', 'MUTARE', 'MUTASA', 'MUTOKO', 'MWENEZI', 'NKAYI', 'NYANGA', 'OUT', 'RUSHINGA', 'SEKE', 'SHAMVA', 'SHURUGWI', 'TSHOLOTSHO', 'U.B.H.', 'U.M.P', 'UMGUZA', 'UMZINGWANE', 'ZAKA', 'ZVIMBA', 'ZVISHAVANE' ) and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "PrEP ST Form, District");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to PrEP ST Form Question

changeSet.author: psi

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ('Static','Outreach') and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "PrEP ST Form, Site Type");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to PrEP ST Form Question

changeSet.author: psi

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ('Urban','Rural') and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "PrEP ST Form, Setting");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to PrEP ST Form Question

changeSet.author: psi

preConditions.sqlCheck: select COUNT(*) from concept_set cs join concept_name cn on cs.concept_id = cn.concept_id where cs.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ( "IPV FormB, Facility", "IPV FormB, Site Type", "IPV FormB, District", "IPV FormB, Setting" ) AND concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") and cs.concept_set IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "PrEP ST Form, Service Provided");
